description:
The latest episode of Game of Thrones revealed the secret of Hodor kept saying “Hodor”. The most heroic and heartbreaking moment in Game of Thrones goes to Hodor. 《权力的游戏》最新一集揭示阿多嘴上一直念着“hodor”的秘密，这也被公认为是本剧最英勇最令人心碎的一幕。

You find out that Hodor—whose real name is Wylis only says “Hodor” over and over again because of some weird time traveling nonsense involving Bran and the Three-Eyed Raven.大家得知阿多真名是威利斯，之所以一直反复说着“Hodor”，是布兰和三眼乌鸦合搞的什么时空穿梭鬼把戏导致的。

The episode ends in a heartbreaking moment where Hodor saves Bran and Meera from the White Walkers and their skeleton army by HOlding the DoOR shut.这集结尾的心碎时刻，阿多为了掩护布兰和米拉逃离异鬼骷髅大军的追赶而“死守大门”（hold the door）。

Many fans touched by Hodor’s loyalty and shocked by the well-designed ending which has be written in the season one already. 粉丝们被阿多的忠诚感动的同时，也惊叹于这埋了六季伏笔精心设计的结局。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 哭瞎！《权力的游戏》Hodor之死竟是埋了六季的伏笔！
